item.title: costume change
item.description: Week 4: Murky Silhouettes. This art was lovingly created using: csp!. Artist’s Notes i saw ‘state of change’ and ‘movement’ and that was it for me! i forgot it was monochromatic entirely oops Social Media Instagram: rybaris Tumblr: rybaris Twitter: rybaris Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer. Parsed source from Discord is as follows: Week: 4 Title: costume change Medium: csp!

item.title: am i coming outta left field
item.description: Week 3: Red Circle. This art was lovingly created using: csp. Artist’s Notes i have a really involved animatic in my head set to rebel just for kicks. i will complete it One Day. here’s a gal from it Social Media Instagram: rybaris Tumblr: rybaris Twitter: rybaris Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer. Parsed source from Discord is as follows: Week: 3 Title: am i coming outta left field Medium: csp Description: i have a really involved animatic in my head set to rebel just for kicks.

item.title: oarfish
item.description: Week 2: Deep Ocean. This art was lovingly created using: csp & lasso tool. Artist’s Notes oarfish swim vertically and that’s been living in my mind rent free for years Social Media Instagram: rybaris Tumblr: rybaris Twitter: rybaris Other Edit this page on GitHub . item.title: egg galaxy
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: csp. Artist’s Notes a girl drawn in contrasting linework in all yellow! with some stars. Social Media Instagram: rybaris Tumblr: rybaris Twitter: rybaris Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer.
